scripts.confgen: npx ts-node --transpile-only ../../src/index.ts vite typescript library:BackendLib node:fs apollo:server
scripts.build:types: tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly -p tsconfig.json --skipLibCheck; tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json; mv dist/index.d.ts dist/index.umd.d.ts
scripts.check:types: tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBUeXBlcyBhcmUgZ29vZCEKCg== | base64 -d; fi
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/*; yarn run build:generate; yarn run build:vite; yarn run build:types
scripts.all: yarn; yarn build; yarn check:types; echo all
